name: mmp Lusternia Scent
matches: You scent at the air, your skilled nose picking up the faint traces of others in the surrounding area.
You snort and snuffle at the air, sensing through a ridiculous pig nose upon your face the faint traces of others in the surrounding area.
A pert little nose takes in a delicate whiff of your surroundings, sensing the faint traces of others in the nearby area.
You tilt back your head and inhale deeply through your nose, the whiskers of a wolf's snout upon your face twitching as you sense the faint traces of others in the surrounding area.
You flutter your nose at the air, sensing through a cute little rabbit nose upon your face the faint traces of others in the surrounding area.
You sniff disdainfully at the air with a snobby snoot, wrinkling your nose as you sense the faint traces of others in the nearby area.
Your snout twitches and trembles at the air, sensing through a striped badger nose upon your face the faint traces of others in the surrounding area.
You twitch your snout and scent the air, sensing through a scaled fink nose upon your face the faint traces of others in the surrounding area.
